___AutoLaunchedApplicationDictionary-man.description: Automatically launch these applications at login

___AuthenticateAsLoginUserShortName.description: Authenticate to the URL with the current users short name. Required if URL is specified, but not for Path

___URL.description: URL to mount in the form scheme://mount.point/Share

___Path.description: Path to the application bundle to launch

___PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

___PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

___PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

___DisableLoginItemsSuppression.description: Disable shift to suppress login items

___PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.
